text:
```json
{
  "explanation": "The purpose described aligns with the idea of building user profiles by mapping multiple IDs into a global ID, which is typically used to create and manage user profiles across different sites. This matches well with Customer Relationship Management, as it involves managing and analyzing interactions with customers to build profiles, as well as Service Personalisation and Personalisation, as it pertains to creating a customized user experience. However, no other concepts directly match the idea of mapping different IDs into one and building profiles across sites.",
  "results": [36, 14, 62],
  "unmatchedConcepts": []
}
```
